properties.name: Mount Thatclif
properties.legend: Erupting volcano. Height: 20477 ft.

properties.name: Oimzois Hot Springs
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 124°F.

properties.name: Eyrukse Purifying Well
properties.legend: This legendary water source is whispered about in ancient tales and believed to possess mystical properties. The spring emanates crystal-clear water, shimmering with an otherworldly iridescence that sparkles even in the dimmest light.

properties.name: Delenbeyli — salt mining town
properties.legend: Delenbeyli is a mining town of 1963 people just nearby the salt mine.

properties.name: Treaq — copper mining town
properties.legend: Treaq is a mining town of 16118 people just nearby the copper mine.

properties.name: Yiraric — copper mining town
properties.legend: Yiraric is a mining town of 21526 people just nearby the copper mine.

properties.name: Stryt — copper mining town
properties.legend: Stryt is a mining town of 5308 people just nearby the copper mine.

properties.name: Kinbizar — copper mining town
properties.legend: Kinbizar is a mining town of 7968 people just nearby the copper mine.

properties.name: Kepekesese Bridge
properties.legend: An old crossing of the Erde River, rarely used since the old waypoints crumbled.

properties.name: The Bright Boar
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious mashed pumpkin with smelly rom is served here.

properties.name: The Dark Falcon
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious pickled falcon with hot liquor is served here.

properties.name: The Yellow Antelope
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious spit-roasted beet with grey nectar is served here.

properties.name: The Dark Snake
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious dry-aged peaches with dark rom is served here.

properties.name: The Golden Tavern
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious stewed carp with light kumis is served here.

properties.name: The Distant Scorpion
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside inn. Delicious smoked scorpion with hot milk is served here.

properties.name: Chazdan Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Sar'heruk Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Stormbersian Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Clifpass Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Sarprak Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Lympshead Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Yeltayan Waterfall
properties.legend: The cascades of a stunning waterfall.

properties.name: Kuipuinx Waterfall
properties.legend: A breathtaking waterfall cuts through the landscape.

properties.name: Clifrost Waterfall
properties.legend: An impressive waterfall has cut through the land.

properties.name: Bralkon Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Narkunese War. 
Date: January 7, 1487 Albrole Era.

properties.name: Knighgulch Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Stiolese Expedition. 
Date: April 13, 1730 Albrole Era.

properties.name: Harthorake Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Rurkarar Invasion. 
Date: October 29, 1730 Albrole Era.

properties.name: Crowglen Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Mostarian Campaign. 
Date: February 3, 1731 Albrole Era.

properties.name: Nulfald Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Guhalhean War. 
Date: March 18, 1729 Albrole Era.

properties.name: Froi Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Uyagh War. 
Date: December 3, 1729 Albrole Era.

properties.name: Pyreaz Monster
properties.legend: Whispers say a relic monster of 12 ft long inhabits Pyreaz Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.name: Kilarakhaz Monster
properties.legend: Legends say a relic monster of 5 ft long inhabits Kilarakhaz Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.name: Yakenev Monster
properties.legend: Elders say a relic monster of 15 ft long inhabits Yakenev Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.name: Moonhelm Monster
properties.legend: Tales say a relic monster of 5 ft long inhabits Moonhelm Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.name: Maltash Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 21 ft long.

properties.name: Dalton Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 20 ft long.

properties.name: Laststrand Bearded Devil
properties.legend: Elders speak of a giant Bearded Devil who inhabits Laststrand hills and eats kids whole.

properties.name: Keri Beast
properties.legend: Inscriptions speak of a golden Beast who inhabits Keri hills and harasses travelers in the area.

properties.name: Huyenchruu Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Argalanism.

properties.name: Misthtown Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Dail (Human) Druidism.

properties.name: Vozuru Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Theodism.

properties.name: Clifrost Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Dail (Human) Druidism.

properties.name: Nuzur Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Dunirr (Dwarven) Deities.

properties.name: Pyreaz Palm Grove
properties.legend: A palm grove sacred to local Thult Faith.

properties.name: Badab Owls
properties.legend: A gang of mounted highwaymen.

properties.name: Ayeresen Ravens
properties.legend: A gang of forest bandits.

properties.name: Lorg Crows
properties.legend: A gang of forest highwaymen.

properties.name: Gridehelm Hawks
properties.legend: A gang of forest highwaymen.

properties.name: Azyoltay Hyenas
properties.legend: A gang of forest highwaymen.

properties.name: Dobaboyvar Jaguars
properties.legend: A gang of forest bandits.

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

An ancient sculpture. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:

properties.name: Ruined Temple
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient temple. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Fortification
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient fortification. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Sacred site
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient sacred site. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Fortress
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient fortress. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Castle
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient castle. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Temple
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient temple. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Yekevrek Archive
properties.legend: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.name: Travelling Fantastical Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this fantastical circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Wonderous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this wonderous circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Extraordinary Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this extraordinary circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Rogue Joust
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a joust of acumen in Rogue, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor.

properties.name: Elt'jaz Fair
properties.legend: A fair is being held in Elt'jaz, with all manner of local and foreign goods and services on offer.

properties.name: Minor Jetty
properties.legend: A small location along the Bazah Creek to launch boats from sits here, along with a weary looking owner, willing to sell passage along the river.

properties.name: Ibises migration
properties.legend: A huge group of ibises are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Antelopes migration
properties.legend: A huge group of antelopes are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Mantises migration
properties.legend: A huge group of mantises are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Vylkun jamboree
properties.legend: A jamboree has been organised at Vylkun as a chance to gather the foreign dignitaries of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis.

properties.name: Entrancing mirage
properties.legend: This entrancing mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Gneabok Cave
properties.legend: The Gneabok Cave. Locals claim that it is the home of strange monsters.

properties.name: Gahar Fracture
properties.legend: The Gahar Fracture. Locals claim that it is the home of strange monsters.

properties.name: Gluth Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Bozbey Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Eselentay Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Fearcoast Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Turk Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Stiol Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Abyssal Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured abyssal rift in this area is causing an emmissary to step through with an all-powerful relic.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Mythgater Cemetery
properties.legend: A towering necropolis adorned with macabre sculptures and guarded by formidable undead sentinels. Its ancient halls house the remains of fallen heroes, entombed alongside their cherished relics.

properties.name: Clayvaleha Cemetery
properties.legend: Rising from the desolate landscape, this sinister necropolis is a testament to necromantic power. Its skeletal spires cast ominous shadows, concealing forbidden knowledge and arcane secrets.

properties.name: Montonver Tomb
properties.legend: A foreboding necropolis perched atop a jagged cliff, overlooking a desolate wasteland. Its towering walls harbor restless spirits, and the imposing gates bear the marks of countless battles and ancient curses.
